whoWeAre.title: Who We Are?
whoWeAre.description: Bantulink is not just a digital platform. It's the technological revolution transforming Africa by connecting talents with opportunities and simplifying online commerce for everyone. We create digital bridges between employers and candidates, sellers and buyers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Connect talents with opportunities and simplify online commerce for all Africans. We create digital bridges between employers and candidates, sellers and buyers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Become the reference super app in Africa, facilitating employment and commerce for millions of users by 2027.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Innovation is in our DNA. We don't just follow global technological trends: we anticipate them and adapt them to the specific needs of Africa.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: Inclusion is not a marketing concept at BantuLink: We build a platform where every African, regardless of background, has equal access to opportunities.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Excellence drives everything we do. From user experience to customer service, we strive to exceed expectations at every touchpoint.

hero.title: Need Help?
hero.subtitle: How can we help you today?

cta.title: Need a custom solution for you?
cta.description: Contact our team to discuss enterprise features, custom integrations, and volume pricing options tailored to your organization.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime from your dashboard. Plan changes take effect immediately or at the end of your current billing cycle, as applicable.

freeTrial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes, new users get a 14-day free trial on all paid plans. No credit card required to start.

business.title: Your Business Empire Awaits
business.subtitle: Launch, grow, and scale your business with powerful e-commerce tools and marketing features.

onlineStore.title: Your Online Store
onlineStore.description: Open your shop in minutes with our intuitive store builder. Customize everything from layout to payment options.

promotion.title: Promote Your Products
promotion.description: Promote what matters most with targeted advertising and featured listings to reach more customers.

chat.title: Chat with Buyers
chat.description: Build trust with real conversations. Answer questions, negotiate prices, and close deals faster.

form.title: I Have a Question For Bantulink
form.subtitle: If you have questions, we will answer them.
form.subscribeSuccess: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!

hero.title: Maybe Your Question Has Been Answered, Check It

whatIs.question: What is Bantulink?
whatIs.answer: Bantulink is a SuperApp that combines recruitment and e-commerce, allowing users to find a job, recruit, sell or buy easily on a single platform.

services.question: What Services Do You Offer?
services.answer: We offer BantuHire for recruitment (job search, networking, certifications) and BantuMarket for commerce (custom stores, secure payments, chat with clients).

access.question: How to Access It?
access.answer: You can access Bantulink via our mobile app available on iOS and Android, or via our website. Sign up with your email to get started.

newsletter.success: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
newsletter.error: Please enter a valid email address.

career.title: Your Career Journey Starts Here
career.subtitle: Connect with opportunities, showcase your skills, and land your dream job with intelligent matching.

smartSearch.title: Smart Job Search
smartSearch.desc: Find offers tailored to your profile with our AI-powered matching algorithm that learns your preferences.

realTimeChat.title: Real-time chat
realTimeChat.desc: Talk to recruiters instantly and get immediate feedback on your applications and interview requests.

videoInterviews.title: Video Interviews
videoInterviews.desc: Get hired from your couch with seamless video interviews integrated directly into the platform.

skillCertifications.title: Skill Certifications
skillCertifications.desc: Validate your skills, stand out from the crowd with verified certifications and skill assessments.

bantuHire.title: BantuHire — The Job Finds You
bantuHire.description: The platform that connects talents and recruiters in one click.

simplifiedSearch.title: Simplified Search
simplifiedSearch.description: Quickly find a job according to your criteria.

networking.title: Networking & Certifications
networking.description: Expand your network and earn badges.

bantuMarket.title: BantuMarket — Commerce without borders
bantuMarket.description: The platform that connects talents and recruiters in one click.

customShop.title: Custom Shop

community.title: The Community Services Call, No Need To Delay Them
community.description: Exchange, Learn, Grow Together. Freelancers, Recruiters, Sellers And Buyers Are Waiting For You.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real feedback from BantuLink users about their experience with our help center and support.

users.name: Sarah Johnson
users.review: The help center made it very easy to understand how to set up my profile and start getting clients. Excellent resource!

users.name: Michael Chen
users.review: Quick responses to all my questions about payments and billing. The search feature works perfectly.

users.name: Amara Okafor
users.review: I found exactly what I needed to complete my applications. The step-by-step guides are very helpful.

cancelSubscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancelSubscription.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. When you cancel, you'll continue to have access to your paid features until the end of your current billing period.

hero.title:
One App,
Two Worlds:
Recruitment & E-Commerce United.
hero.subtitle: Find A Job, Recruit, Sell Or Buy Safely With BantuLink.

security.title: Security
security.description: Security is not an option at BantuLink, it's our absolute priority. In a digital environment where trust is fragile, we have chosen to invest massively in the most advanced security technologies.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Innovation is in our DNA. We don't just follow global technological trends: we anticipate them and adapt them to the specific needs of Africa.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: Inclusion is not a marketing concept at BantuLink: We build a platform where every African, regardless of their educational level or resources, can access digital opportunities.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Excellence drives everything we do. From user experience to customer service, we strive to exceed expectations at every touchpoint.

2024.desc: It all starts with a shared observation by the TNK SYNERGIES LTD team: the idea of BantuLink is born from this observation: create a super-app that solves these two challenges simultaneously, with a 100% African approach.

2025.desc: 2025 marks the start of BantuLink's technical development. Our team of 15 experienced developers, based in Douala, works in agile mode to create a robust, secure, and intuitive platform.

today.desc: Every line of code is designed for the African user: multilingual interfaces (French/English).

partners.tnkTitle: TNK SYNERGIES LTD: the company revolutionizing digital Africa
partners.tnkDesc: TNK SYNERGIES LTD is not a tech company like the others. Founded in 2024 by a team of experienced African entrepreneurs, our company has set itself the mission of creating the digital solutions that Africa lacks.

testimonials.title: Satisfying Our Clients Is<br className="hidden md:inline"/>Our Best Advertising.
testimonials.quote1: Bantulink helps you see how many extra days you have left to work to reach your goal.
testimonials.quote2: An incredible experience! The team exceeded all my expectations. I highly recommend their services.
testimonials.quote3: Very satisfied with the final result. Quality is on point and customer support is excellent.
testimonials.quote4: An intuitive platform that facilitates professional and commercial connections. A must!
testimonials.quote5: Bantulink allowed me to develop my network and boost my online sales quickly.
